title: Web-Based Distance Education Program Design and Operational Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform (LMS) usage experience and understanding of secondary education curricula
context.additional_context: Learners participate in asynchronous learning using personal devices, receiving feedback weekly through module-based assignments and formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core components of a web-based distance education program (content structure, assessment system, technological infrastructure).
Learners can design and apply effective interaction strategies in an LMS environment.
Learners can analyze formative assessment results and propose improvements for educational programs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
